title: About time
creator_credit: Ed De Martin, Robert Marona and De Martin - Marona
brief_description: Presents the story of a girl and a tree she discovered as a child. Compares this relationship and the paradox of modern man caught in the time squeeze in order to point out the need for man to reorder his values concerning planet Earth.
